::Spears:: 

She turned and looked at Striker.
"Hey, thanks for putting up with me for the duration of the flight. I 
looked stupid, I know I did.  But please don't tell anyone about it. 
It's rather a pain to be a fighter who is afraid of heights." She 
looked at the ground and her face turned red.
